testcase.name: Search Experience for product search in both Home and Offers page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on GreenCart Landing Page.....................................passed When User searched with Shortname Tom and extracted actual name of the product.passed And Added "3" items of the selected product to cart.........................passed Then User proceeds to Checkout and validate the Tom items in checkout page..passed And Verifies if user has ability to enter promo code and place the order....passed

testcase.name: Search Experience for product search in both Home and Offers page 2
testcase.system-out: Given User is on GreenCart Landing Page.....................................passed When User searched with Shortname Beet and extracted actual name of the product.passed And Added "3" items of the selected product to cart.........................passed Then User proceeds to Checkout and validate the Beet items in checkout page.passed And Verifies if user has ability to enter promo code and place the order....passed
